us.title: Mystery Whale Moves 534 BTC – Is a Massive Bitcoin Sell-Off Coming?
us.content: A whale just moved 534 BTC ($45M) after 9 years—will Bitcoin crash or rebound? Traders watch $84K support as volatility surges. What's next? The post Mystery Whale Moves 534 BTC – Is a Massive Bitcoin Sell-Off Coming? appeared first on Cryptonews.

us.title: Fed projects transitory tariff inflation amid 'high' uncertainty
us.content: The Federal Reserve is expecting higher inflation and lower growth than anticipated. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Jennifer Schonberger outlines what the market has heard from the Fed this week, including New York Fed president John Williams saying "uncertainty is high.

us.title: Wall Street Closes Volatile Week Full of Uncertainty
us.content: Trade policy and inflation concerns -- in keeping with the theme for the month -- were in focus over the last five volatile days.

us.title: Equities have put in a tradable short-term low, says Morgan Stanley's Andrew Slimmon
us.content: CNBC's Steve Liesman and Andrew Slimmon, Morgan Stanley Investment Management senior portfolio manager, joins 'The Exchange' to discuss the signs Slimmon is seeing that show the equity correction may be over, if the economy will slow down, and much more.

us.title: Rhinebeck Bank President and CEO Michael J. Quinn to Retire After 40 Years of Service; Board Initiates Leadership Transition
us.content: POUGHKEEPSIE, NY / ACCESS Newswire / March 21, 2025 / Rhinebeck Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:RBKB), the holding company for Rhinebeck Bank (the "Bank"), today announced that President and Chief Executive Officer Michael J. Quinn will retire following an extraordinary 40-year career with the Bank, including 20 years as CEO.

us.title: Why Remy Cointreau Stock Is Interesting Here
us.content: The beverage industry is facing instability, but I believe it offers excellent valuation opportunities, particularly in premium brands like Rémy Cointreau SA. Rémy Cointreau's ultra-premium portfolio, including Louis XIII and Remy Martin, shields it from volatility and ensures long-term growth potential. Despite current challenges, Rémy Cointreau's valuation below 20x P/E and strong fundamentals make it a "Buy" with a price target of €80/share.

us.title: We could have a positive case scenario from tariffs, says Fundstrat's Tom Lee
us.content: Tom Lee, Fundstrat managing partner, joins 'Closing Bell' to discuss the  market sentiment, the growth scare and corporate confidence.

us.title: There could be a new set of risks to the US economy as April 2nd reciprocal tariff deadline looms
us.content: April 2 is being referred to as "Liberation Day" by President Trump, the day when his administration's reciprocal tariffs are set to go into effect. Yahoo Finance senior columnist Rick Newman comes on Catalysts to speak on the next set of risks that could threaten the US economy under Trump, especially amid the stock market's current rout (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) and the quickening pace of layoffs.

us.title: Nike shares tumble as tariff concerns shake investor confidence
us.content: Shares in NIKE, Inc. (NYSE: NKE) are falling in early market trading after the company announced its Q3 2025 results yesterday. Currently, NKE shares are down around 8% as investors digest not just the company's most recent earnings results but the statements the shoe giant made about its current Q4, which ends in May.

us.title: The market may be trying to bottom out, says Ed Yardeni
us.content: Ed Yardeni, Yardeni Research president, joins 'Closing Bell' to discuss the tariff risk to the market and the overall sentiment.

us.title: This Week in Meme Coins: SPX Rallies 22% While Toshi, PNUT Suffer Losses
us.content: The crypto market had a rather stable week, with the leader, Bitcoin, safe from witnessing any sharp rise or fall. This extended to the meme coins as well, with the lack of volatility resulting in altcoins taking a direction.

us.title: Fed officials double down on uncertain outlook and biggest risk to economy
us.content: CNBC's Steve Liesman reports on the Federal Reserve.

us.title: Generative AI Digest: Focus Shifts From Risk To Investment
us.content: Generative AI market developments can almost be read as a call and response. Notable figures in the AI industry - as well as some politicians, investors and academics - were engaged in discussions related to AI safety and perceived existential threats.

us.title: Stock market expert reveals 'preferred' asset amid volatile market
us.content: MacroMavens President Stephanie Pomboy joins ‘Mornings with Maria' to break down the current status of the markets and how higher interest rates are impacting the economy.

france.title: Ventripoint Announces Closing of $500,000 Non-Brokered Convertible Debenture Unit Private Placement
france.content: Toronto, Ontario, March 21, 2025 – TheNewswire - Ventripoint Diagnostics Ltd. (“ Ventripoint ” or the “ Corporation ”, TSXV:VPT) announces the closing of its previously announced (see press release of March 14, 2025) non-brokered private placement (the “ Offering ”) of unsecured convertible debenture units (“ Units ”), subject to final TSXV Venture Exchange (the “ Exchange ”) acceptance. The Corporation has issued 500 Units for aggregate gross proceeds of $500,000.   Each Unit is comprised: of one (1) unsecured convertible debenture principal amount of $1,000 (“ Debentures ”) convertible into common shares (“ Common Shares ”) of the Corporation; and 7,143 common share purchase warrants (“ Warrants ”).

france.title: VolitionRx Limited's Upcoming Earnings and Innovations in Cancer Diagnostics
france.content:
• VolitionRx Limited (NYSE American: VNRX) is set to release its quarterly earnings with an expected EPS loss of $0.06 and revenue of approximately $545,340.
  • The company's Nu.Q® Cancer diagnostics test, capable of detecting 21 types of human cancers, positions VolitionRx as a potential leader in the $20 billion liquid biopsy industry.
  • Despite its innovative advancements, VolitionRx faces financial challenges, including a negative P/E ratio of -1.60 and a current ratio of 0.22, indicating potential liquidity issues.

VolitionRx Limited (NYSE American: VNRX) is a multi-national epigenetics company known for its innovative cancer diagnostics. The company is set to release its quarterly earnings on March 24, 2025, with analysts predicting an EPS loss of $0.06 and revenue of approximately $545,340. The earnings report will be released before the market opens.

VolitionRx is making strides in the cancer diagnostics field with its Nu.Q® Cancer diagnostics test. This test can detect 21 types of human cancers with high specificity, as highlighted by PR Newswire. The test's rapid and low-cost nature positions it as a potential game-changer in the $20 billion liquid biopsy industry.

The company has also introduced a new industry primer focusing on lung cancer, emphasizing the Nu.Q® Cancer Test's potential to transform the $4 billion lung cancer market. The test aims to improve diagnosis, treatment, and monitoring, offering a low-cost, easy-to-administer solution that requires only a small blood sample.

VolitionRx is conducting a clinical study at National Taiwan University Hospital to validate its Nu.Q® Lung Cancer Test. This study, involving 500 patients, aims to differentiate between malignant and benign pulmonary nodules. The test has already shown promise in distinguishing nodules found through LDCT screening.

Despite its innovative advancements, VolitionRx faces financial challenges. The company has a negative P/E ratio of -1.60, indicating a lack of profitability. Its price-to-sales ratio of 40.62 and enterprise value to sales ratio of 40.99 suggest a high valuation relative to sales. Additionally, the current ratio of 0.22 may indicate potential liquidity issues.

france.title: Crypto Asset Manager Canary Capital Continues ETF Application Spree with New Filing for Pudgy Penguins NFT Fund
france.content: The crypto asset manager Canary Capital has filed an S-1 registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for a new non-fungible token-focused exchange-traded fund (ETF). If approved, the “Canary PENGU ETF” will offer investors exposure to the Pudgy Penguins NFT project.

france.title: German regulator rejects Ethena Labs' license application in the EU, suspects sUSDe is a security
france.content: Germany's Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin) has rejected Ethena Labs' application to issue asset-referenced tokens under the European Union's Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCAR). The regulator also raised concerns that the sUSDe may constitute an unlicensed security offering.

france.title: Bausch Health Announces Conditional Redemption of Senior Notes
france.content: LAVAL, QC / ACCESS Newswire / March 21, 2025 / Bausch Health Companies Inc. (NYSE:BHC)(TSX:BHC) (the "Company" or "Bausch Health") today announced that (i) it has delivered conditional notices of redemption for all of its outstanding 5.500% Senior Secured Notes due 2025, 9.000% Senior Notes due 2025, 5.750% Senior Secured Notes due 2027 and 6.125% Senior Secured Notes due 2027 (collectively, the "BHC Notes") and (ii) 1375209 B.C. Ltd., the Company's indirect wholly-owned subsidiary ("HoldCo"), has delivered a conditional notice of redemption for all of its outstanding 9.000% Senior Secured Notes due 2028 (collectively with the BHC Notes, the "Notes").

france.title: Zentek Announces Results of Canada Revenue Agency Audit
france.content: GUELPH, ON / ACCESS Newswire / March 21, 2025 / Zentek Ltd. ("Zentek" or the "Company") (NASDAQ:ZTEK)(TSXV:ZEN), announces that the Canada Revenue Agency ("CRA") has completed an audit (the "Audit") on January 14, 2025 of the Company's 2018 and 2019 renunciation of Canadian exploration expenses ("CEE") in favour of subscribers of the private placements of flow-through common shares which closed on December 21, 2018 and December 20, 2019 (the "Flow-Through Financings") for aggregate gross proceeds of $4,210,000.

france.title: Ternium Announces Annual and Extraordinary General Meetings of Shareholders
france.content: LUXEMBOURG / ACCESS Newswire / March 21, 2025 / Ternium S.A. (NYSE:TX) announced today that its annual general meeting of shareholders will be held on Tuesday, May 6, 2025, at 9:00 a.m.

france.title: Summit Therapeutics Reports Inducement Grants Under Nasdaq Listing Rule 5635(c)(4)
france.content: MIAMI--(BUSINESS WIRE)---- $SMMT--Summit Therapeutics Inc. (NASDAQ: SMMT) ("Summit," "we," or the "Company") today announced the grant of inducement awards of options to purchase a collective total of up to 147,500 shares of common stock. Awards were made to seven new employees of the Company. The awards were granted as an inducement material to the new employees becoming employees of the Company in accordance with Nasdaq Listing Rule 5635(c)(4) and have been approved by the Company's Compensation Commit.

france.title: Pump.fun Rolls Out PumpSwap DEX to Compete with Raydium
france.content: PumpSwap introduces zero-fee token migrations and a creator revenue-sharing model, posing a direct threat to Raydium.
